resources.string: Swipe left or right for different functions.\n (Tap to continue)

Contact your elected officials!
enter your zip-code below
and tap GO for all your
representatives' contact info

Contact a House Representave!
enter a House Rep's last name
and then tap GO for all of
their contact info

Contact your House Representatives!
enter your state abbreviation
and tap GO for all of
their contact info

Contact a Senator!
enter a Senators last name
and tap GO for all of
their contact info

Contact your Senator!
enter your state abbreviation
and tap GO for all of
their contact info
